title: BioShock 2 Remastered + Minerva’s Den Remastered, v1.0.122864
body:
BioShock 2 Remastered + Minerva’s Den Remastered, v1.0.122864


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Companies: 2K Boston, 2K Australia, Blind Squirrel, 2K
Languages: ENG/MULTI7
Original Size: 14.9 GB
Repack Size: from 6.6 GB [Selective Download]

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / LATER KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only] MULTi7
  • FreeTorrents ENG Only
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] ENG Only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2] MULTi7
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, partially compatible with other mirrors) MULTi7
  • Filehoster: MegaUp (Uploaded by Sylvano, partially compatible with other mirrors) MULTi7

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on BioShock.2.Remastered-CODEX ISO release: codex-bioshock.2.remastered.iso (15,523,840,000 bytes)
  • The following updates installed over: BioShock.2.Remastered.Update.v20161007-CODEX (60 MB), BioShock.2.Remastered.Update.v20161220-CODEX (85 MB) and BioShock.2.Remastered.Update.v20171205-CODEX (329 MB)
  • Game version: v1.0.122864
  • The Protector Trials DLC & Minerva’s Den Remastered DLC are included and activated
  • Alternative cracks (3DM and ALI213) available in NoDVD folder after installation, courtesy of Christsnatcher!
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selected download feature: you can skip downloading and installing components you don’t need: language files, attract & credits videos, unused files
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 14.9 to 6.6~9.2 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 10-20 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 21 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game’s “Build\Final” folder to change the game language
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

You can skip downloading of unnecessary languages and videos. Here is the list of such files:

At least one of the language files must be downloaded

fg-selective-english.bin
fg-selective-french.bin
fg-selective-german.bin
fg-selective-italian.bin
fg-selective-spanish.bin

fg-optional-attract-and-credits.bin (demo trailer and credits video)
fg-optional-unused.bin (leftovers from console versions of the game, not used on PC)

In example, if you want play the game with Spanish UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers and to be able to see credits – skip all selective/optional files, but download fg-selective-spanish.bin, fg-optional-attract-and-credits.bin & all main files (01-06).

Game Description

BioShock 2 provides players with the perfect blend of explosive first-person shooter combat and compelling award-winning storytelling. The halls of Rapture once again echo with sins of the past. Along the Atlantic coastline, a monster has been snatching little girls and bringing them back to the undersea city of Rapture. Players step into the boots of the most iconic denizen of Rapture, the Big Daddy, as they travel through the decrepit and beautiful fallen city, chasing an unseen foe in search of answers and their own survival.

Game Features

  • High Resolution Textures, Models and Interface Art
  • 4K Resolution Support
  • The Protector Trials. You receive the call: Tenenbaum desperately needs you to steal as much ADAM as possible, to help thwart Sofia Lamb’s insane plan. Enter the Protector Trials: frantic combat challenges designed to push your mastery of weapons and Plasmids to the limit. The goal in each Trial is simple: get your Little Sister to an ADAM-rich corpse and keep her safe while she gathers precious ADAM. Opposition mounts as your Little Sister nears her goal — will you survive the onslaught?
  • Minerva’s Den Remastered included

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is NOT backwards compatible with my previous B2R repack.
